thread.section_title: Hotel Mogador - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very small but excellent value for money.
thread.title_full: Very small but excellent value for money. - Review of Hotel Mogador, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Franz B
title: Very small but excellent value for money.
text:
I mean, I won't spend 3 months in this hotel but for 2-3 days it s ok. I had the single room and it was the minimum you can imagine in terms of space, but at the minimum price for a decent hotel. The hotel is recently refurbished and you will feel comfortable.
Bed was ok and zero noise (my room had a window in the rear of the hotel).
I would certainly stay again, I hope to become rich and afford a more spacious hotel in the ludicrous Paris!!
